pr_title: Add more test and refactor a few old tests

timeline.message: add more test and refactor a few old tests

timeline.bodyText:
It might be interesting to add a test where there is a default country hint. Then the user sets a different value for country hint in the request.
The later should take precedent.
timeline.author: maririos

timeline.bodyText: This will require client builder tests to be implemented in both sync and async clients. Instead, can all these tests be done in TextAnalyticsClientBuilderTest?
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.message: using Spanish instread of French in countryHint tests

timeline.bodyText: Since there is just one builder, you can do all the testing in this class itself. Don't need a base class and then extend it to run the tests.
timeline.author: srnagar
